outline:
1. to laugh, play, mock
    1. (Qal)
      1. to laugh (usually in contempt or derision)
      2. to sport, play
    2. (Piel)
      1. to make sport
      2. to jest
      3. to play (including instrumental music, singing, dancing)
    3. (Hiphil) to laugh mockingly
kjv_def: deride, have in derision, laugh, make merry, mock(-er), play, rejoice, (laugh to) scorn, be in (make) sport.
strongs_def: to laugh (in pleasure or detraction); by implication, to play
